Developer Terms of Use
des:
Check your Ooma Voicemail and control your Ooma Home Security system hands-free. To enable the skill you will need your Ooma phone number or Account ID and password to connect an existing Ooma account.

With the Ooma skill you can check your voicemail hands-free by saying
“Alexa, ask Ooma to play my voicemail.”

If you are an Ooma Home Security customer, you can disarm the system and check system status hands-free. Just say:
"Alexa, ask Ooma to turn off the siren" or
"Alexa, ask Ooma for the status of my sensors".

To make phone calls using your Echo, we recommend using an Echo Connect device connected to your Ooma Telo. The Echo Connect will allow you to make and receive Ooma calls hands-free using the microphone and speaker on your Echo.

Ooma (NYSE: OOMA) creates powerful connected experiences for businesses and consumers, delivered from its smart cloud-based SaaS platform. For consumers, Ooma provides PureVoice HD voice quality, advanced functionality and integration with mobile devices. Ooma’s groundbreaking home security solution delivers a full range of wireless security sensors and a smart video camera that put consumers in charge of protecting their homes. Learn more at www.ooma.com.
